articles.title: A Chinese fighter jet came within 10 feet of a B-52 bomber, U.S. military says - NPR
articles.description: A Chinese fighter jet came within 10 feet of an American B-52 bomber flying over the South China Sea, nearly causing an accident, the U.S. military said.
articles.content:
A U.S. Air Force B-52 bomber flies during the Seoul International Aerospace and Defense Exhibition 2023 at Seoul Air Base in Seongnam, South Korea, on Oct. 17, 2023.
AP
